item.title: PAROMOMYCIN
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db01421
DrugCentral: paromomycin
Synonymous :(1r,2r,3s,4r,6s)-4,6-diamino-2-{[3-o-(2,6-diamino-2,6-dideoxy-beta-l-idopyranosyl)-beta-d-ribofuranosyl]oxy}-3-hydroxycyclohexyl 2-amino-2-deoxy-alpha-d-glucopyranoside | aminosidin | aminosidine | catenulin | crestomycin | estomycin | hydroxymycin | monomycin a | neomycin e | paromomicina | paromomycin | paromomycin i | paromomycine | paromomycinum | paucimycin | paucimycinum | zygomycin a1


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of paromomycin gene in 1 abstracts.

pmid sentence
32579907 In this study, we found a single drug Paromomycin against two targets of COVID-19 i.e. […] Paromomycin was found to have strong binding affinity against both the targets of coronavirus. […] Current study concluded that Paromomycin is an effective dual targeting drug against coronavirus, as it binds not only to the protease domain of the virion but also with the spike domain with high stability.
